cafe - Variable in class Helpers.ServerHelpers.ActionOrder
 
cafe - Variable in class Helpers.ServerHelpers.ClientInterface
 
Cafe - Class in Helpers.ServerHelpers
A class that contains the 3 areas that drinks can be in and handles the moving of drinks between them, the list of clients currently in the cafe, the number of clients waiting for orders and the information for the drinks.
Cafe() - Constructor for class Helpers.ServerHelpers.Cafe
Creates a cafe which initializes the drinks and starts brewing.
checkConnection() - Method in class Helpers.CustomerHelpers.ServerWriter
Tests connection by sending a PING request.
checkOrder() - Method in class Helpers.ServerHelpers.ActionOrder
Check that the orderArgs are in the correct format, set relevant error message if not in the correct format.
checkOrderArgLengths() - Method in class Helpers.ServerHelpers.ActionOrder
Checks that the orderArgs lengths are correct for an order command.
checkOrderArgValues() - Method in class Helpers.ServerHelpers.ActionOrder
Checks that the orderArgs are correct, error messages set if any checks fail.
checkOrderComplete() - Method in class Helpers.ServerHelpers.Cafe
Checks if any order has been completed, is called everytime a drink is brewed and added to the tray area, it is also called from whenever a Client leaves and their drinks get redistributed.
checkReceived() - Method in class Helpers.CustomerHelpers.ServerWriter
Calls for the ServerInterface to check that a message has been received from the server.

clientExited() - Method in class Helpers.ServerHelpers.ClientInterface
Outputs that the client has disconnected/failed to connect, removes client and their drinks from cafe and closes the reader, writer and socket.

ClientInterface - Class in Helpers.ServerHelpers
A ClientInterface is created on its own thread for every new client that joins the cafe, it performs a handshake with a Customer which is determined by the passed socket from Barista.
ClientInterface(Socket, Cafe, int) - Constructor for class Helpers.ServerHelpers.ClientInterface
Creates a new ClientInterface.
